document.full_text: syrian authorities have charged 33 activists who mounted a silent protest for the release of political prisoners with "weakening national morale and compromising the state," defense lawyers said.
document.title: syrian protesters charged with "weakening morale"
lines_and_colors: syrian authorities have charged 33 activists who mounted a silent protest for the release of political prisoners with "weakening national morale and compromising the state," defense lawyers said.
